subject: Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Adelina Sotnikova used a boost from the crowd to become the first Russian woman to win gold in singles figure skating, knocking Kim Yu-na off her perch at the top of the sport.
snippet: Adelina Sotnikova used a boost from the crowd to become the first Russian woman to win gold in singles figure skating, knocking Kim Yu-na off her perch at the top of the sport.
